name: Vo3
summary: Vision Of Victory Of Violence (Vo3). At the end of a 300 solar cycle conflict, the planet Taia has been colonized by a religion who calls themselves The Blind Faith, led by The Starborn Prophet. You are a prisoner of this conflict and you begin your journey in Prison Pit III, one of the many islands on the mostly-water planet. Use running in place, swinging swords, and meditating to exit the prison in this very physical VR...
